short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: This extension saves a list of links to pages to read later.
short.bg: Това разширение запазва списък от връзки към страници за по-късно четене.
short.de: Diese Erweiterung speichert eine liste von webseiten, die später gelesen werden.
short.es: Esta extensión de internet guarda una lista de enlaces de páginas para leer más tarde.
short.fr: Cette extension sauvegarde une liste de liens vers des pages a lire plus ulterieurement.
short.it: Questa estensione risparmia una lista di pagine web per leggere più tarde.
short.zh_CN: 这个扩展工具可以帮助收藏很多用于以后阅读的页面。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This reading list extension allows you to save pages in a list to get back to later. It’s super slick and easy to use, and it helps keep your tab count down.

How to use it?

 1. Go to a page you want to save for later
 2. Click the reading list icon on the top right of your browser Chrome Reading List icon
 3. Click the + button
 4. When you want to read a page you saved, open up the extension and click the reading item you want to read (control + click or command ⌘/windows key ⊞ + click to open the page in a new tab)
 5. Done with a page? Click the × next to said page in your reading list, and it will magically vanish.
